# Premium Spirits - Liquor Store Website

## Project Overview
A stunning, modern frontend website for a premium liquor store business built with Angular 19. Features a luxurious design with a landing page, about page, and contact page with forms and maps integration.

## Project Structure
- **Framework**: Angular 19 (standalone components)
- **Styling**: SCSS with custom variables
- **Routing**: Angular Router
- **Forms**: Reactive Forms with validation

## Features Implemented
✅ Responsive navigation header with scroll effects
✅ Beautiful hero section with animations
✅ Product showcase grid
✅ About page with team and company values
✅ Contact form with validation
✅ Embedded Google Maps
✅ Professional footer with business information
✅ Mobile-responsive design
✅ Luxurious color scheme (browns, golds, dark backgrounds)

## Color Scheme
- Primary: #8B4513 (Saddle Brown)
- Secondary: #D4AF37 (Gold)
- Accent: #C19A6B (Tan)
- Dark Background: #1a1410
- Light Background: #f5f5f0

## How to Run
```bash
ng serve
```
Then open http://localhost:4200/ in your browser

## How to Build
```bash
ng build
```

## Project Status
✅ All pages completed and styled
✅ Navigation and routing working
✅ Contact form functional
✅ Maps integrated
✅ Fully responsive design
✅ Production build successful
